name: USDT (Bridged)
description: USDT is a stablecoin (stable-value cryptocurrency) that mirrors the price of the U.S. dollar, issued by a Hong Kong-based company Tether. The tokenâ€™s peg to the USD is achieved via maintaining a sum of dollars in reserves that is equal to the number of USDT in circulation.  CKB-USDT is backed 1:1 with the official ETH-USDT, endorsed by Bitpie.
